definition: role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to feel attached to/to long for/to love
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: We encourage normal intercourse, and oppose love triangles.
sentences.chinese: 我们鼓励正常的交往，反对三角恋爱。

sentences.english: A love triangle of the most grotesque kind.
sentences.chinese: 最荒诞不经的一种三角恋爱。

sentences.english: It's a film of triangular love affair.
sentences.chinese: 那是个三角恋爱的电影。

definition: (of a relationship) improper (adulterous, incestuous, teacher-student etc)/unseemly
to rival sb for the affection of a man or woman/to be jealous of a rival in a love affair
sb who is romantically involved with sb already in a committed relationship/the other woman/the other man/third person/third party (in dispute)/disinterested party/number three in a list
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
